Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed with exceptional quality and functionality in mind. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your daily experience. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its intrinsic value and the effort put into creating it, I am offering you the opportunity to purchase it for $100. This price reflects the superior quality and the exclusive access you'll have to this product. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your routine with our top-tier offering. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
